institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 22 (Vitalization of business such as follow-up management)
contents: Article 22 (Vitalization of business, including follow-up management) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall make efforts to identify and manage the employment status of participants in the Global Job Support Project, share information among employed people, and resolve difficulties. ② Details of follow-up management for each project may be determined separately by the Chairman, taking into account the characteristics of each project. ③ Pursuant to Paragraph 1, the standardization of work related to job placement and training recipients, operating institutions, and recruitment agencies and the onlineization of documents will continue to be carried out. ④ The Chairman may specialize in tasks by continent and job type and provide support for cultivating the information processing and analysis capabilities of Corporation personnel.
